OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupImmersiveEngineering
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Immersive Engineering Ores.

OptionChoice.name: enableImmersiveEngineering
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation handle Immersive Engineering ore generation?

Choice.description: Use Custom Ore Generation to handle Immersive Engineering ores.
Immersive Engineering ores will be handled by the mod itself.

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Copper is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: iengCopperFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Immersive Engineering Copper distributions

OptionNumeric.name: iengCopperSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Immersive Engineering Copper distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Bauxite is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: iengBauxiteFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Immersive Engineering Bauxite distributions

OptionNumeric.name: iengBauxiteSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Immersive Engineering Bauxite distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Lead is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: iengLeadFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Immersive Engineering Lead distributions

OptionNumeric.name: iengLeadSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Immersive Engineering Lead distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Silver is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: iengSilverFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Immersive Engineering Silver distributions

OptionNumeric.name: iengSilverSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Immersive Engineering Silver distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Nickel is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: iengNickelFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Immersive Engineering Nickel distributions

OptionNumeric.name: iengNickelSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Immersive Engineering Nickel distributions

Substitute.name: iengOverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: iengCopperVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Cloud.name: iengCopperCloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: iengCopperHintVeins
Veins.Description: Single blocks, generously scattered through all heights (density is about that of vanilla iron ore). They will replace dirt and sandstone (but not grass or sand), so they can be found nearer to the surface than most ores. Intened to be used as a child distribution for large, rare strategic deposits that would otherwise be very difficult to find. Note that the frequency is multiplied by ground level to maintain a constant density, but not by ore frequency because it is assumed that the frequency of the parent distribution will already be scaled by that.

StandardGen.name: iengCopperStandard
StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.
